mapper.insert: INSERT INTO closed_day_tbl (closed_id, facility_id, closed_date, closed_content) VALUES (#{closedId}, #{facilityId}, #{closedDate}, #{closedContent})
mapper.select: SELECT c.closed_id AS closedId, c.facility_id AS facilityId, f.facility_name AS facilityName, c.closed_date AS closedDate, c.closed_content AS closedContent FROM closed_day_tbl c JOIN facility_tbl f ON f.facility_id = c.facility_id WHERE c.facility_id = #{facilityId} AND c.closed_date BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} ORDER BY c.closed_date
